means: [人名] [苏格兰人姓氏] 沃德尔 Waddell的变体

sentence.Network_en: In the evenings, ducks waddle up to the front door to be fed.
sentence.Network_cn: 傍晚时分，鸭子们摇摇摆摆地来到前门进食。

sentence.Network_en: We waddle and hop and have lots of fun.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们走起路来摇摇摆摆,还一跳一跳的.我们的生活很有趣.

sentence.Network_en: This may mean having to part with a waddle of cash.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可能意味着一大笔钱将离开你.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学科技英语 ... ice ruff： 冰轴；冰架；冰环 waddle： 蹒跚而行 mate： 交配.
GRE形近词_百度文库 ... virtuous 高尚的，正直的 waddle 摇摇摆摆地走 waffle 胡扯.

list.abs: Feelings are too fragile , in reality often waddled in front of the foot ., 感情太过脆弱 , 在现实面前常常站不稳脚.
there was the pitying chuckle that bubbled in my throat when I watched a fat duck waddle across the back yard .当看到一只胖胖的鸭子摇摇摆摆地穿过后院时，我在喉咙里咕噜出怜惜的暗笑。
vulvovaginitis 外阴阴道炎waddling gait 鸭步态wai ch'iu 外丘
1.蹒跚步态（waddling gait）走路时左右摇摆如同鸭步，见于佝偻病、大骨节病、进行性肌营养不良、先天性双侧髋关节脱位等。　　2. …
Stand so still while they waddle my way ., 他们摇摇摆摆朝我走来时 , 我站着不动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: perhaps a frequentative of wade

entry.tran: 蹒跚行走;摇摇晃晃地行走
entry.def: To waddle somewhere means to walk there with short, quick steps, swinging slightly from side to side. A person or animal that waddles usually has short legs and a fat body.

example.ex: McGinnis pushed himself laboriously out of the chair and waddled to the window...
example.tran: 麦金尼斯吃力地从椅子上站起来，摇摇晃晃地走到了窗前。

example.ex: In the evenings, ducks waddle up to the front door to be fed.
example.tran: 傍晚时分，鸭子们摇摇摆摆地来到前门进食。

means.word_mean: 1. walking with a waddling gait; walking with short steps and the weight shifting from one foot to the other

auth_sentence.content: But Stickle just hoped that it might help him waddle a little faster.

auth_sentence.content: I tell her I don't think that's an entirely fair way of looking at the situation and waddle off.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I tell her I don't think that's an entirely fair way of looking at the situation and waddle off.

auth_sentence.content: Now I cannot get the image out of my mind of the ducks heading for the bunker at a speedy waddle.

sentences.en: A family of ducks waddled along the river bank.
sentences.cn: 一群鸭子沿 河岸摇摇摆摆地走。
